migrations.description: As of NgRx v18, the `TypedAction` has been removed in favor of `Action`.

migrations.description: Updates calls to afterRender with an explicit phase to the new API

migrations.description: As of NgRx v18, the `concatLatestFrom` import has been removed from `@ngrx/effects` in favor of the `@ngrx/operators` package.
migrations.name: ngrx-effects-migration-18-beta
